name: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company
name_abbreviation: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Co.

judges: Before McCollum, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.
parties: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Dean,
In appeal by Apollo Oil & Gas Company from this same decree, we this day in opinion handed down, affirmed the decree of the court below. It follows from that decree that this one should be affirmed.
Decree affirmed accordingly.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Dean,

attorneys: James W. Lee and John B. Chapman, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company
(No. 2).
Argued March 4, 1902.
Appeal, No. 29, Oct. T., 1902, by defendant, S. W. Yandersaal, from decree of C. P., No. 1, Allegheny Co., March T., 1900, No. 522, on bill in equity in case of George A. Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company, Limited, L. T. Yoder and S. W. Vandersaal.
Before McCollum, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.
Affirmed.
Willis F. McCook, for appellant.
James W. Lee and John B. Chapman, for appellee.
October 13, 1902.
